TrEd Extension: elixir (version 1.2.1.0)

ElixirFM Lexicon

(generated documentation)

Description:

Editing, browsing, and processing of the lexicon of ElixirFM.

Installation

This extension can be installed directly from TrEd, using Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Get New Extensions; just make sure the repository http://ufal.mff.cuni.cz/tred/extensions/core/ is enabled in Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Edit Repositories.

TrEd macro files:

  • elixir/contrib.mac
  • elixir/ElixirFM.mak

Resource files:

  • elixir.schema.xml
